video.title: God, Guns & Automobiles
video.synopsis: This reality series follows the staff of Max Motors, a small-town car dealership run by fast-talking Mark Muller and his shock jock brother, Mancow.

episodes.synopsis: Mark offers to help out his top salesman, who needs to clean up his act to avoid jail time, while Mancow has a rough day riding with the repo team.
episodes.title: Muller's Way

episodes.synopsis: Despite his brother's pleas to tone down his antics, Mark promises his sales staff that he'll blow up a car if they meet their monthly sales goal.
episodes.title: Welcome to Max Motors

episodes.synopsis: Determined to boost sales, Mark concocts a sales promotion involving aliens, UFOs and crazy prices. But can the staff meet the challenge he's set?
episodes.title: Cowboys and Aliens

episodes.synopsis: Mancow's attempt to bring in business doesn't go smoothly. Meanwhile, Mark's new assistant, Jason, has to deal with being "the new guy."
episodes.title: Midnight Madness

episodes.synopsis: Mark is tested when he collaborates with local law enforcement to host a gun buyback event and, later, when his son Max asks him for a job.
episodes.title: The Great Gun Buyback

episodes.synopsis: When Mark rushes off to Chicago in search of his dream car, a 1957 Cadillac convertible, Rod is left in charge and discovers it's hard to be boss.
episodes.title: Urban Cowboy

episodes.synopsis: Mark attempts to motivate the sales staff by offering them a chance to ride against him in a demolition derby, which prompts Mancow to take action.
episodes.title: Demolition Men

episodes.synopsis: Mark stages a publicity stunt by holding Mongo's return to cage-fighting at the dealership. Meanwhile, Mancow wants to cash in as Mongo's new manager.
episodes.title: Fight Night

episodes.synopsis: Amy bets Mark that he can't refrain from buying more cars for his personal collection, while the staff plans a last-minute Veterans Appreciation Day.
episodes.title: Respect the Vet

episodes.synopsis: Mark's youngest son, Matt, persuades his dad to go into the moonshine business, and Jason struggles to keep up with his duties while training Mongo.
episodes.title: Shine On

episodes.synopsis: When Mark is caught understaffed during the annual Butler rodeo, he's forced to recruit his wife and sons to work at the dealership.
episodes.title: Family Circus

episodes.synopsis: While preparing for one of Missouri's largest auctions, an overwhelmed Mark neglects his visiting mother, leaving it up to Mancow to keep her happy.
episodes.title: Speed Auction

episodes.synopsis: When construction at the dealership drives off business, Mark invites everyone to his house for a work retreat that revs up with target shooting.
episodes.title: The Art of the Retreat

episodes.synopsis: With Mark and the Max Motors crew gearing up for a big reveal on the lot, the job of acquiring event fireworks falls to a flustered Mancow.
episodes.title: Going Big Time
